name: Die Jail Web Version
description:
Die Jail is a first person shooter where you are inside a die and fight against waves of enemies while the die changes its faces. Survive long enough and you will encounter with the Final Boss. Are you skillful enough to defeat all your enemies and escape the Die Jail?

This is a slightly improved version ported for HTML5.

ORIGINAL VERSION: https://santino-baldan.itch.io/die-jail-downloadable

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space Bar to jump
  • Left Click to shoot
  • Left Shift to run

Credits:

  • Team:

Programmers: Juan Fangano, Lucas Genovese, Fabrizio Piermarocchi

Game Designers: Santino Baldan, Lucía Chilievich, Esteban Roel

Artists: Tomás Bermúdez, Lucía Chilievich

  • Music: 

Royalty Free Space/Sci-Fi Music - "Space Ambience" - Alexander Nakarada (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sB6jXSr7_wQ)

Space Aliens Like Heavy Metal Too - Industrial/Metal - Royalty Free Music - TeknoAXE (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sANQgnSdWHY)

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
